column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/90fd87376d4ccb1ce9eec703b756dd292bee8288 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

ACK,

Though please use a more descriptive title for your commit next time. One that summarizes the change. This allows for reading the commit log without referring to github.
You can put the "Fixes #issue" part in the message body.
@laanwj, understood. Thanks for the guidance and the explanation.\n
